title: [Sponsor] Simris Algae Omega-3
content:
Do you need supplements? No. But your body needs omega-3s. One third of the gray matter in your brain is literally made up of omega-3, so you better eat that fatty fish regularly. Worried about overfishing? Or all those heavy metals, PCBs and dioxins in fish? So are we. Simris is not just another supplement brand. We are a science-based company replacing unsustainable marine ingredients with microalgae, grown at our own farm. Simris Algae Omega-3 is our flagship product line combining Scandinavian innovation and design at its finest. If you’re okay with supplements, you can skip the fish.

 ★
author: Daring Fireball Department of Commerce
